spec_data.Name: perl-ElasticSearch-SearchBuilder
spec_data.Description:
The Query DSL for ElasticSearch (see Query DSL), which is used to write
queries and filters, is simple but verbose, which can make it difficult to
write and understand large queries.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 11:13:47 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Perlish compact query language for ElasticSearch
